Detailed Description

A plot data source.

Member Function Documentation

CPTNumericData * CPTPlotDataSource-p::dataForPlot:field:recordIndexRange: ( CPTPlot *  plot,
[field] NSUInteger  fieldEnum,
[recordIndexRange] NSRange  indexRange 
) [virtual]

Gets a range of plot data for the given plot and field.

Parameters:
plotThe plot.
fieldEnumThe field index.
indexRangeThe range of the data indexes of interest.
Returns:
A one-dimensional array of data points.
CPTLayer * CPTPlotDataSource-p::dataLabelForPlot:recordIndex: ( CPTPlot *  plot,
[recordIndex] NSUInteger  index 
) [virtual]

Gets a data label for the given plot. This method is optional.

Parameters:
plotThe plot.
indexThe data index of interest.
Returns:
The data label for the point with the given index. If you return nil, the default data label will be used. If you return an instance of NSNull, no label will be shown for the index in question.
double CPTPlotDataSource-p::doubleForPlot:field:recordIndex: ( CPTPlot *  plot,
[field] NSUInteger  fieldEnum,
[recordIndex] NSUInteger  index 
) [virtual]

Gets a plot data value for the given plot and field.

Parameters:

Returns:
